fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check if a player owns the hit 2017 Team Cherry game 'Hollow Knight'

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When checked, a player must provide their steam library or other evidence they own the hit 2017 Team Cherry game 'Hollow Knight'. If they do not or cannot provide evidence, you will rampage at their house.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the upcoming Team Cherry game 'Hollow Knight: Silksong' be released before the end of the game
